successes.title: MIOPS: Smartphone Controllable High Speed Camera Trigger
successes.description: MIOPS Smart, smartphone controllable camera trigger for high speed photography!

Pledges.description: LOVE + THANKS - That's what we feel for your pledge + a Thank You on our website for helping us to create a REAL camera trigger!
SUPER EARLY BIRD (BASIC) - With this Super Early Bird special, get one MIOPS BASIC. Savings of $50.
SUPER EARLY BIRD (ULTIMATE) - With this Super Early Bird special, get one MIOPS ULTIMATE. Savings of $50.
MIOPS BASIC - Get your MIOPS BASIC at the first batch. Your device will not be smartphone controlled. You will be able to use lightning, sound, laser, timelapse, DIY and HDR functions.
EARLY BIRD (ULTIMATE) - Just missed the Super Early Bird level? This is the next best thing. Get one MIOPS ULTIMATE. Savings of $30.
MIOPS ULTIMATE - Get your MIOPS ULTIMATE at the first batch. So that you will have a smartphone controlled and fully functional MIOPS.
MIOPS PREMIUM - Get your MIOPS PREMIUM and be one of the limited people who have their names at the device screen instead of MIOPS logo.

MIOPS BOOSTER - Get your MIOPS ULTIMATE + 1 Flash Cable + 2 Camera Cables + 1 Spare Battery + 1 Laser Pointer at the first batch. So that you will have a smartphone controlled and fully functional MIOPS with special add-ons.

MIOPS BOOSTER (PREMIUM) - Get your MIOPS PREMIUM + 1 Flash Cable + 2 Camera Cables + 1 Spare Battery + 1 Laser Pointer at the first batch. So that you will have a smartphone controlled and fully functional MIOPS with special add-ons. Also be one of the limited people who have their names at the device screen instead of MIOPS logo.
DOUBLE-PACK (BASIC) - Get 2 x MIOPS BASIC at the first batch. Savings of $49.
DOUBLE-PACK (ULTIMATE) - Get 2 x MIOPS ULTIMATE at the first batch. Savings of $59.
DOUBLE-PACK (PREMIUM) - Get 2 x MIOPS PREMIUM at the first batch. Savings of $59.
DOUBLE-PACK BOOSTER (ULTIMATE) - Get 2 x MIOPS BOOSTER (ULTIMATE) at the first batch.
DOUBLE-PACK BOOSTER (PREMIUM) - Get 2 x MIOPS BOOSTER (PREMIUM) at the first batch.
